text: The 1908–09 Kansas Jayhawks men's basketball team represented the University of Kansas in its eleventh season of collegiate basketball, and its second in the Missouri Valley Intercollegiate Athletic Association, or MVIAA. The team would go on to win its second MVIAA Conference Championship. The head coach was Dr. Forrest "Phog" Allen, serving in his second and final year of his first tenure. ==Roster== *Ralph Bergen *Robert Heizer *Thomas Johnson *Verne Long *Donald Martindell *George McCune *Carl Rouse *Earl Woodward 2014-15 Kansas Jayhawks men's basketball media guide. Retrieved 2015-May-22. ==Schedule== Big 8 Record Book ==References== Category:Kansas Jayhawks men's basketball seasons Kansas Kansas Kansas
title: 1908–09 Kansas Jayhawks men's basketball team
